publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4563 Mike Pringle: Boroughmuir High School Wins National Consumer Champions Award Again—That the Parliament congratulates Boroughmuir High School’s team of Scott Duncan, Malcolm Perry, Cameron Roscoe and Ruaridh Beveridge on winning the Young Consumers of the Year 2009 Award in Brighton on 1 July 2009, sponsored by The Trading Standards Institute, in which the team represented not only their school and city but also Scotland, making them national champions, and on regaining the title yet again for Boroughmuir High. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Christine Grahame*, David Stewart*, Bill Kidd*
